course.subject: ENVS
course.name: Environmental Conservation and Sustainability in Practice
course.description: Students will visit various field sites of Hong Kong (for example, Mai Po Nature Reserve, marine parks, research laboratories under our Environmental Science Programs, government facilities). Through this course, students are expected to gain more ideas and enhanced appreciation on local conservation/sustainability efforts, and be inspired about how to apply academic knowledge in practice. Graded P or F. Cantonese may be used in field trips, in some situations. Instructor’s approval is required for enrolling in the course. Priority will be given to ENVS students.

reviews.author: Nandi
reviews.comment_content:
Literally just field trips. The field trips are fun but have to wake up at 6 am almost every week. But tbh I don't see the point of the course.

1. Kadoorie Farm & Botanic Garden
2. Fung Yuen Butterfly Reserve
3. SENT Landfill
4. Voluntary Service at HK Wetland Park   
5. Mai Po Nature Reserve
6. ALS Testing Lab
7.  Career Workshop: CV Writing & Interview Skills
reviews.comment_teaching: There's nothing to be taught. The professors don't really teach anything. It's mostly the people on the sight. I personally don't speak Cantonese, but just speak to the instructors in person and they'll explain it in English or just ask someone else to translate.
reviews.comment_grading:
It's a P/F course. Just don't miss any of the trips

The final assignment is 1000 word essay on the conservation efforts made in HK. 200 words for any 4 sites and 200 words summarizing/ your view on the conservation efforts.
reviews.comment_workload:
BE ON TIME. A lot of these locations are really far off if you miss the bus then it costs $400 to get to places like Mai Po.

The final assignment is really easy and nothing to worry about.

reviews.author: scientist123
reviews.comment_content: waking up at 6 am every week to get on the coach and then go to far places. the travelling time of going to the far place is even longer than the visiting time.
reviews.comment_teaching: ice ko is a very strict instructor and she is strict in every small and non-sense things that most of the students in our class can't stand her. she makes student afraid of her in the whole process of this course....
reviews.comment_grading: no grading for this course, pass or fail only

reviews.author: MNC
reviews.title: Good Exp to observe the environment
reviews.comment_content:
Going to some high environmental value place.
eg. Mai Po Nature Reserve, Fung Yuen Butterfly Reserve, Kadoorie Farm and Botanic Garden
reviews.comment_teaching:
Not many Teaching from the instructor.
Mostly from the staff in the corresponding place.
reviews.comment_grading:
Pass or Fail.
If you don't escape lessons and take all the attendance.
Hand in the report before the deadline, an easy pass will be rewarded
reviews.comment_workload:
The workload is just to attend the lesson on time.
The lesson must start very early (about 8AM)
If you escape lesson once, you will be in big trouble.
4 place is needed to be described in your report.
1000 words in total.
very easy job.

reviews.author: JL
reviews.title: Must take for ENVS students. Take if you are not an ENVS student.
reviews.comment_content:
Fun field trips in different HK valuable sites.
Students can enter some restricted areas in Maipo or Kadoorie Farm.
Free transportation and send you back to UST right after fun field trip.
reviews.comment_teaching: Do not expect much teaching from the instructors. The tour guide will be the one teaching and answering your questions.
reviews.comment_grading:
Pass of Fail.
Just don't absent without prior notice.
Writing a simple essay of the course reflection and description of the sites.
reviews.comment_workload:
Very light.
Using course time to go field trip but the course time is quite long. When the gathering location is not at HKUST, you have to go to Kowloon Tong yourself in the early morning.

reviews.author: chj
reviews.comment_content:
會去香港好多個出名既環境保育 有生態價值既地方
例如  Mai Po Nature Reserve, Fung Yuen Butterfly Reserve, Kadoorie Farm and Botanic Garden
reviews.comment_teaching:
去到field site, 啲staff就會做導賞

最重要最重要 準時到,  最好可以早小小到
同埋預啲時間會塞下車咁
總之 一夠鐘,  車就會走, 遲到就要自己用方法入去到
如果上唔到車, 去唔到field trip會當absence
reviews.comment_grading:
Pass or Fail
有交report 正正常常都會pass
reviews.comment_workload:
出7次field trips 自己簡4次寫report,
每次field trip寫200字, 關於個NGO對environmental conservation做過啲咩 上網會搵到
total 寫4次200字加200字既自己opinion
所以workload其實好低

最高既workload就係要早起 因為出field trip 集合時間早

reviews.author: Rottenapple
reviews.comment_content:
Field Trip (1): Coastal Marine Lab, HKUST
Field Trip (2): Air Monitoring Station, HKUST
Field Trip (3): SENT Landfill
Field Trip (4): Fung Yuen Butterfly Reserve
Field Trip (5): Kadoorie Farm & Botanic Garden
Field Trip (6): Mai Po Nature Reserve
Workshop (1): CV Writing
Field Trip (7): Voluntary Service at HK Wetland Park
Workshop (2): Interview Skills
reviews.comment_teaching:
同所有ICEKO既堂一樣, 要100%準時
上堂時間0830 1分鐘都唔可以遲
reviews.comment_grading:
Written assignment (40%)
Participation (60%)

Written唔會話太認真, 1,000字, 7個field trip講4個, 唔chur
For each field trip, write 200 words (in English) summarizing the conservation effort made by the corresponding organization
The remaining 200 words should be your opinions about conservation in Hong Kong

其他果60%就只要準時, 聽野唔好訓教就ok

reviews.author: OY
reviews.title: 輕鬆field trips
reviews.comment_content:
成個course得7-8次field trip + 2個talk
2次係係科大(marine lab+air condition center) ,米埔,嘉道理,濕地公園, 堆填區, fungyuen
最有用應該就係果2個talk 教你 寫CV同interview skill
雖然上堂時間係830-1250, 但係得米埔同嘉道理先要930去到KLT
reviews.comment_teaching:
每次field trip都有專人介紹 而ice ko有時都會加下口講下
輕鬆唔好訓教就得
reviews.comment_grading:
Pass or Fail
好似講過話無去一次咁多就會fail
reviews.comment_workload:
1 cred想要workload都難
最後要交份1000字 report include
4 * conservation effort related to specific field trip (200 each)
200字講下你對HK conservation 意見
完!
最大嘅workload 應該每次field trip都要準時到LOL 有人試過late左之後要自己去...
